heading: HR00864
0: A RESOLUTION URGING THE DEPARTMENT OF HEALTH (DOH) TO PRIORITIZE, HASTEN AND FACILITATE THE ACCREDITATION OF THE CAGAYAN VALLEY  MEDICAL CENTER (CVMC) AS LICENSED COVID-19 TESTING CENTER AND ALL GOVERNMENT TERTIARY HOSPITALS IN THE COUNTRY INCLUDING  OTHER PUBLIC HEALTH FACILITIES THAT ARE CAPABLE AND/OR QUALIFIED TO ADMINISTER COVID-19 TESTING

House Bill/Resolution NO. HR00864
FULL TITLE : A RESOLUTION URGING THE DEPARTMENT OF HEALTH (DOH) TO PRIORITIZE, HASTEN AND FACILITATE THE ACCREDITATION OF THE CAGAYAN VALLEY MEDICAL CENTER (CVMC) AS LICENSED COVID-19 TESTING CENTER AND ALL GOVERNMENT TERTIARY HOSPITALS IN THE COUNTRY INCLUDING OTHER PUBLIC HEALTH FACILITIES THAT ARE CAPABLE AND/OR QUALIFIED TO ADMINISTER COVID-19 TESTING
